commit.message:
Index: libjava/ChangeLog
from  Scott Gilbertson  <scottg@mantatest.com>

	* Makefile.in: Re-generated.

	* gnu/awt/xlib/XToolkit.java

	* gnu/awt/xlib/XGraphicsEnvironment.java: New file.
	* sources.am: Re-generated.
